markdownRemark.html: An 8-day summer trip split across the cities of Tokyo, Osaka, and Kyoto. The highlights of this trip were lining up for omakase sushi at 3 am at the Tsukiji fish market, exploring local streets, and catching the sunset over the Tokyo skyline from Odaiba.
